title: Blade Assault | Review in 3 Minutes
description:
Elise Avery reviews Blade Assault, developed by Team Suneat.

Blade Assault on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1367300/Blade_Assault/

title: Dark Souls: Nightfall Documentary - The Fan-Made Sequel to the Original Dark Souls
description:
In our latest documentary, we explore the making of the upcoming Nightfall mod for Dark Souls. Nightfall is a work in progress fan-made sequel that explores new gameplay mechanics, a new storyline and more. 

A demo for the mod dropped today so you can try it for yourself: https://twitter.com/grimrukh/status/1484543430969729033
